channel.title: The Soap Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with soap stars
channel.itunes:author: The Soap Show
channel.itunes:summary: Hear interview with soap stars from UK and Australian soaps like EastEnders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street, Neighbours and Home and Away. And we have regular guests from the classic Aussie soaps like Sons and Daughters and Prisoner.
channel.description: Hear interview with soap stars from UK and Australian soaps like EastEnders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street, Neighbours and Home and Away. And we have regular guests from the classic Aussie soaps like Sons and Daughters and Prisoner.

item.title: The Soap Show
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: All about a new internet radio soap
item.itunes:summary: UIan talks to the creator of a new internet radio soap, Eye of the Storm.
item.itunes:keywords: soap opera, soaps, radio soap, Dallas, Dynasty, Flamingo Road, Days of our Lives

item.title: The Soap Show - Episode 2
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive! News about Aussie soaps on DVD!
item.itunes:summary: Exclusive! Hear breaking news about the latest classic Aussie soaps to be released on DVD
item.itunes:keywords: Sons and Daughters, The Young Doctors, Number 96, Arcade, The Restless Years, Chopper Squad, Class of 74, The Soap Show, Australian soaps, soap operas, Andrew Mercado

item.title: The Soap Show - Episode 3
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Soap interviews, gossip and news
item.itunes:summary: Listen to interviews with Bernie Nolan and Paul Dawber, plus this week's soap storylines and soap news
item.itunes:keywords: soap opera, soaps, The Bill, Brookside, Bernie Nolan, Paul Dawber, Sons and Daughters

item.title: The Soap Show - Episode 4
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: The Soap Show
item.itunes:summary: Ian talks to the creator of a new internet radio soap Eye of the Storm
item.itunes:keywords: soap opera, soaps, radio soap, Dallas, Dynasty, Flamingo Road, Days of our Lives

item.title: The Soap Show - Episode 5
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: The Soap Show
item.itunes:summary: Ian talks to soap expert Chris Stacey about the soaps currently on UK television
item.itunes:keywords: soap opera, soaps, Coronation Street, EastEnders, Days of Our Lives, Guiding Light, Young and the Restless, Neighbours

item.title: The Soap Show - Episode 6
item.itunes:author: The Soap Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Soap opera podcast
item.itunes:summary: In this edition we talk about new ITV1 soaps The Royal Today and Echo Beach
item.itunes:keywords: soaps, soap opera, The Royal Today, Echo Beach
